comment: The bonus opportunity was a good chance to improve my class average and show my opinion on a current topic. It was an enjoyable assignment, especially since I already knew a lot about the topic and what to do in scenarios like this. I would recommend future assignments similar to this one. Thank you.
Thanks for returning my call, other instructors don't
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: He is fair but you cannot wait until the last minute to do your work. The weekly discussion posts were great and brought out more of my classmates.

No real review or study guide for tests so you don't know what to study. He sets weekly deadlines about two days earlier than all other courses. He aims to fail not teach. GPA killer. Pay for our own proctored tests and we already paid an online course fee!?!

Pay for your tests, learn material yourself. He gives extremely unclear instruction if instruction is given at all. Answers questions (somewhere) on his site, frequently refers to these answers, simply saying I already answered that. Site is an unorganized mess. Hard to contact, terse when actually conversing. Frequently impatient and belittling.
A lot of homework with no clear grading criteria. He gives you a grade with no explanation. No study guides or reviews. He lists topics and its up to you to decide what in those topics are important.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: By far the worst instructor at Kennesaw. Very strict grading. He is unfamiliar with the course material and doesn't seem to have the students best interest at heart. We have spent the first 6 weeks of class trying to correct an issue that he should have known about before classes even started. He aims to fail. Majority of class is failing.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK
